docs.lead_paragraph: State Controller Arthur Levitt has called for Federal legislation to limit the profits a drug company may earn from a patented drug that is essential to life.

headline.main: LEVITT ASKS LAW ON DRUG PROFITS; Controller Urges Regulation of 'Essential' Medicine

docs.abstract: Levitt lauds HEW Dept for turning over to Justice Dept Antitrust Div his request for probe; says problem can only be solved by legis to limit drug co profits from 'miracle drugs'; co comments
docs.snippet: State Controller Arthur Levitt has called for Federal legislation to limit the profits a drug company may earn from a patented drug that is essential to life.
